description: HMD launched the HMD Skyline handset with a Nokia Lumia 920-inspired design earlier this year. A recent report suggests that the company is expected to soon unveil a new smartphone inspired by the design of the Nokia Lumia 1020. The moniker of this rumoured smartphone is not yet known. However, a leaked render has suggested the expected design elements of the purported phone.
title: HMD Working on Nokia Lumia 1020-Inspired Smartphone: Report

description: Xiaomi 15 Ultra is expected to launch in China as part of the company’s latest flagship smartphone lineup. The handset’s camera and other specifications have now been reportedly leaked and it may come with an upgraded version of the Sony LYT-900 sensor. It is also speculated to get upgrades in terms of the selfie camera, while Xiaomi’s Camera app may also have new features.
title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra to Debut With an Upgraded Sony LYT-900 Sensor, New Selfie Camera: Report

description: Qualcomm reportedly announced a new variant of the Snapdragon X series chipset at the Internationale FunkAusstellung Berlin (Berlin International Radio Exhibition) 2024 event on Tuesday. The new variant, dubbed Snapdragon X Plus X1P-42-100, is said to power the “second wave” of AI PCs. Also known as Copilot+ PCs, this chipset will reportedly provide 45 trillion operations per second (TOPS).
title: Qualcomm to Launch New Snapdragon X Series Chip That Will Power More Affordable AI PCs Later This Year: Report

description: Apple has begun placing orders for OLED displays for the upcoming iPhone SE model from China's BOE Technology and South Korea's LG Display, according to Nikkei.
title: Apple to Switch to OLED Displays for All Upcoming iPhone Models From 2025: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Pro 360 is expected to make its global debut later this year. The purported 2-in-1 laptop is likely to be a part of the South Korean technology conglomerate's Galaxy Book 5 lineup. Although Samsung hasn't confirmed the existence of the device, the specifications of the Galaxy Book 5 Pro 360 have leaked, suggesting features such as an AMOLED touchscreen display, Intel Lunar Lake processor, and S Pen support.
title: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Pro 360 Key Specifications, Renders Surface Online

description: The iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus will offer some improvement as compared to its predecessors. The new iPhone models will come with a new Capture button, allowing users to capture photos by clicking on it. The models are also rumoured to be powered by the A-series chipset coupled with better display and design capabilities.
title: iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus Roundup: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Features, Specifications, and More

description: Boult Bassbox X60, Bassbox X250, and Bassbox X500 soundbars were launched in India on Tuesday. They are equipped with the company's BoomX technology which is said to offer users a studio-quality bass experience and seamless Bluetooth connectivity. They have dedicated DSPs and preset EQ modes for music, movies, and news.
title: Boult Bassbox X60, Bassbox X250, and Bassbox X500 Soundbars Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Cardano recently completed its Chang upgrade, granting ADA token holders the ability to participate in electing representatives and vote on development-related matters.
title: Cardano Ecosystem Steps into Decentralised Governance Era with ‘Chang’: All Details

description: The Hisense E6N is a 4K smart TV that offers good value for money. It is available for purchase in three screen sizes and comes with HDR10, Dolby Digital, and DTS Virtual X audio enhancements. The VA panel also supports VRR up to 60Hz and up to 300 nits brightness. Due to Hisense being the official partner for the UEFA Euro2024 cup, the smart TV gets an AI Sports mode claimed to improve your sport viewing experience. Read our review to find out if it actually does that.
title: Hisense E6N Smart TV Review: Makes Sense at the Price

description: Data collected by Arkham Research showed that the hacker who exploited the WazirX wallet for over $230 million (roughly Rs. 1,900 crore) is using the controversial Tornado Cash platform to do so. The exchange said it is working with law enforcement agencies and the CERT-In to identify the hacker.
title: WazirX Hacker Moves Millions Worth of ETH Using Tornado Cash, Suggests Arkham Research

description: Microsoft’s artificial intelligence (AI) feature Recall, which is yet to be available to the public, reportedly cannot be uninstalled from Windows 11. Recently, it was said to be available to Windows Insiders in the 24H2 version of Windows 11 in preview. Interestingly, that version allowed users to uninstall the feature.
title: Microsoft AI Recall Feature Reportedly Cannot Be Uninstalled From Windows 11

description: Google Pixel users in Europe will now be able to measure their body temperature. This feature works by leveraging the Pixel Thermometer app and the temperature sensor that Google introduced with its Pixel 8 Pro last year. The sensor is also available in the new Pixel 9 Pro lineup. While its capabilities were initially limited to measuring the temperature of objects, the tech giant expanded its use case in the US earlier this year, permitting the measurement of body temperature.
title: Google Pixel Phones With Temperature Sensor Get Support for Body Temperature Measurement in Europe

description: HMD Hyper is expected to be an upcoming mid-range phone whose design and key features have surfaced online previously. Another new leak has now surfaced hinting at several specifications of the smartphone alongside reiterating some of the older claims. It is expected to get a Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 SoC and a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit. The new leaked renders of the HMD Hyper suggest the colour options as well. It is expected to launch with a Nokia Lumia series-inspired design.
title: HMD Hyper Leaked Renders Suggest Colour Options; Key Features Tipped Again

description: iPhone 16 series is expected to launch at the Apple event on September 10. Continuing the trend of yesteryears, Apple's flagship smartphone lineup may comprise four models, with the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max models being the top-of-the-line variants. While these handsets are speculated to receive several internal upgrades, a new report now hints at a new colourway being introduced this year, in addition to design tweaks to the camera system.
title: iPhone 16 Pro Leaked Video Suggests New Coffee Colour Option and Camera Changes

description: UPI Circle, the latest innovation in Unified Payments Interface (UPI) was rolled out by the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) last week. The feature allows UPI users to enable trusted people by letting them have access to their accounts. This way, those even without a UPI account can make transactions with the payment instrument.
title: UPI Circle Feature With Access to Secondary User Payments Rolled Out in India by NPCI

description: Realme Buds N1 will soon launch in India, the company confirmed officially. It is set to launch in the country alongside the Realme Narzo 70 Turbo 5G. The design of the upcoming true wireless stereo (TWS) earphones has been revealed alongside several of their key features. The TWS earphones will support hybrid noise cancellation and spatial audio effects. Availability details of the Realme Buds N1 have also been confirmed.
title: Realme Buds N1 India Launch Date Set for September 9; Design, Key Features Revealed

description: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE is expected to launch later this year. Ahead of its official debut, the handset's charging details have surface online and it doesn't spell promising news for prospective buyers. The South Korean technology conglomerate may have again capped the charging capabilities of its purported handset at a significantly lower speed than its maximum limit of 45W that is available on the Galaxy S24 series.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE’s Charging Specifications Surface Online Ahead of Expected Launch

description: The group said chip policy under the incoming EU Commission should feature fewer export restrictions, focus on areas where European companies already had advantages, and that aid should be awarded more quickly.
title: Semiconductor Body ESIA Calls for EU 'Chips Envoy', More Support

description: Brazil's telecoms regulator threatened to sanction Elon Musk's satellite broadband company Starlink hours after its top court stood behind a controversial decision to ban social network X from the country. The development has stirred tensions between Brazil and Starlink chief Musk.
title: Brazil Telecom Regulator Threatens Sanctions Against Elon Musk's Starlink After X Ban

description: Gadgets 360 spoke with Cameron Adams, Co-Founder and Chief Product Officer at Canva to better understand the intricacies of the design world, how the companies look at AI, and what is the larger vision behind it. Founded in 2013, the Sydney-based graphic designing platform has recently integrated a wide range of AI tools and launched a major enterprise-focused suite. The move breaks an age-long tradition of remaining community-driven space for casual designers, college students, social media influencers, and independent marketers.
title: Instead of a Threat, Canva Sees AI as a Tailwind, Says Co-Founder Cameron Adams

description: nfinix Hot 50 5G is confirmed to launch in India on September 5. Its design and key features were recently revealed by the company. Now, Infinix has teased the price range of the handset and confirmed its availability details. Earlier reports claimed that the upcoming smartphone may launch alongside the Infinix Hot 50 4G, Hot 50 Pro, Hot 50 Pro+, and Hot 50i variants. The lineup is expected to succeed the existing Infinix Hot 40 series.
title: Infinix Hot 50 5G Price Range in India Teased; Flipkart Availability Confirmed Ahead of September 5 Launch

description: OpenAI is reportedly developing a proprietary artificial intelligence (AI)chipset which will be manufactured by chipmaker Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company Limited (TSMC). As per a report, the AI firm is looking to build a custom chipset based on the A16 Angstrom process which is yet to hit mass manufacturing. Interestingly, Apple is said to have also placed orders for the same chipsets, likely to be used in future iPhone models.
title: OpenAI Reportedly Developing Proprietary AI Chipsets, Said to Be Manufactured by TSMC

description: Integrating AI with cryptocurrencies for transactional purposes, as per Coinbase, could serve as an initial stride toward empowering AI agents to handle financial management and execute intricate tasks through simple text commands.
title: Explained: Coinbase CEO’s Demonstration of First AI-to-AI Crypto Transaction

description: Rocksteady Studios has reportedly been hit with layoffs. The job cuts are said to have impacted the studio’s quality assurance (QA) department, with nearly half the team members laid off.
title: Rocksteady Studios Reportedly Hit With Layoffs After Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League Sells Poorly

description: Google’s latest foldable smartphone is a second-generation device, but there’s still plenty to get excited about as it’s the first Pixel foldable to reach India. While Google announced the Pixel 9 Pro Fold in India officially last month, its availability was not revealed. The phone was not up for pre-order as well, even though it is available on sale in many countries globally. However, Flipkart has now confirmed the phone's sale date in India.
title: Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold to Go on Sale in India on September 4: Price, Offers

description: Huawei's tri-fold smartphone will launch in China soon. Its launch was recently teased by the company as well. In recent weeks, the rumour mill has also hinted at the expected specifications of this groundbreaking handset and its prototype was allegedly spotted in the hands of a notable company official. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the smartphone's moniker has been confirmed and it will be the latest entry into the Huawei Mate series of devices.
title: Huawei Tri-Fold Smartphone Will Be Called ‘Mate XT’ in China: Expected Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy M05 is expected to launch in India soon as a successor to the Samsung Galaxy M04, that was unveiled in the country in December 2022. The Galaxy M05 is expected to be available in the same price segment as its preceding model. The handset was previously spotted on several certification sites. Now, the official support page of the Galaxy M05 has gone live on the India site suggesting an imminent launch.
title: Samsung Galaxy M05 Official Support Page Goes Live in India; May Launch Soon
